item.title: Distilling
item.description: Distill the anxious mind time is the alembic through which the fumes focus--- Napping through the winter solstice to honour the dark descen’ts renewal moving into light, the axis shifts back--- General hilarity as cacao hits the blood stream of joy, sugar, high teeter the edge of inflamed gut brain ...
